msg: DERBY-4108: Small improvements to release summary for 10.5: hotlink the pointer to the in-memory-db primer, add bold prefixes to descriptions of new features so that they pop-out for the reader.

author: mmartinec
msg: Bug 6060: let the Check.pm plugin produce smaller chunks
of source code (60 kB) to avoid Perl compiler crashing
on exceeding stack size, and to reduce memory footprint
